title: Bug 7945 - Search results not selected in external jar
description: Bug 7945 describes an issue where search results are not being selected in an external jar. The bug was observed in build 200201151 while performing a search for references to a specific field. The current bug report lacks sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections. I will infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report accordingly.
OB: When performing a search for references to the specified field in the external jar, the search results are not being selected. However, no additional information is provided about the behavior of the software in this scenario.
EB: The expected behavior is that when searching for references to the specified field in the external jar, the search results should be selected. In this specific case, the expected outcome is to obtain 3 matches in the method getTempDir().
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the external jar containing the code.
2. Perform a search for references to the specified field.
3. Verify that the search results are not being selected.
